question: On February 15, 1951, at the school on via Toledo, what specific items did Nunzia bring as gifts for Professor Oliviero?

What specific silver jewelry items was the narrator wearing and constantly touching during the New Year's Eve celebration at Don Achille’s house in 1962?

Which specific members of the Sarratore family were lying or playing on Malonti Beach when Elena arrived on July 15, 1963?

On October 1, 1963, in Mergellina, which two specific authors did Nino buy books by, despite finding them dull?

When Lina finally came out of the bedroom to leave the rentals on the morning of August 11, 1963, what specific color and style of dress was she wearing?
On November 1, 1963, at her house, what specific items did Lina pack into the suitcase she had used for her honeymoon before hiding it behind the living room door?
When Nino spoke to the narrator at school on December 5, 1963, what was the name of the magazine he was editing and what was the title of his own article inside it?
On the evening of November 2, 1963, who were the specific individuals from both families that arrived at Lina's house after Stefano discovered she had left?

What was the specific question the narrator wrote in her report at home on December 5, 1963, regarding God and the Holy Spirit?

In the spring of 1966 at Posillipo, how many notebooks were contained within the metal box that Lina handed to the narrator?
